summary: This mod change Aela\'s facial structure
descriptionHtml:
Aela meets Aveline Vallen from DragonAge2.
I like very much Aveline Vallen character and when i start to play in Skyrim and i met Aela The Huntress, i thought to make Aela in Aveline. They are very strong women!
I changed only facial structure because Aela is just powerful ;).
Sorry for my bad english!

*How to install*
Open rar, extract files and put them on your main skyrim file - Data.
NMM: Open NMM program and add \"Aela meets Aveline Vallen\" file rar, and then active.
Make sure to active esp file ;).
*How to unistall*
Open skyrim main data file, search \"Aela the Huntress\" bsa and esp file, delete them :).
author: Nephae
